body: i keep cumming back to this one after all this years, but now i actually watched the show

This artist is a god for me.
I've been waiting for a Kurapika doujin of at least halfway decent quality for so long, and now one of my favorite artists did one of him. How did I end up so blessed ;~;

I don't think I am a fudanshi or gay but I'm sure this wasn't a waste because the author is likely to be please with his own work and that is everything a piece of art need to succed. The aproval of it's own creator is the only thing that please me the most as long as it's not following a political or economic agenda it's all good.

And if I'm gay just because I like yaoi(but not muscular that shit is even a turn off in straight manga for me) then good to know :v you learn something about yourelf every day
Bad that all the mens around me are ugly or something because I have never felt atracted to any of them and that is so weird man it is supposed that I'm gay since I like yaoi... But I'm sure it's just bad luck in fact I would date a rock if I liked a rock but as long as the only thing that seems to get my attention are bodies of the females around me I would probably never be able to conffirm if I'm gay or not the only thing for sure is that I like yaoi XD

Holy fuckin shit an actual Kurapika doujinshi... and from such a quality artist, you guys don't understand how nice this is there's like 5 Kurapika doujins from the last 15 years this cute boy deserves more thank you whoever uploaded this God speed 🙏
Not a waste for me then, I'm not a fujoshi but as long as it has good art I fap.
Waste of good art on yaoi... lucky for fujoshis and faggots T.T
